name: redom
description: Tiny turboboosted JavaScript library for creating user interfaces. 100 % test coverage!

scripts.build: npm run build-es && rollup -c -n redom -f umd -i src/index.js -o dist/redom.js
scripts.preversion: npm run build && npm run uglify && npm run test
scripts.prepublish: npm run build && npm run uglify && npm run test
scripts.test: npm run lint && rollup -c -n redom -f cjs src/index.js -o test/redom.js && browserify -t coverify test/index.js | tape-run | coverify
scripts.bench: npm run lint && rollup -c -n redom -f cjs src/index.js -o bench/redom.js && browserify bench/index.js | tape-run
scripts.nocoverage: standard src/index.js && rollup -c -n redom -f cjs src/index.js -o test/redom.js && browserify test/index.js | tape-run

author: Juha Lindstedt
